userData.noNotes.title: You don't have any personal notes.
userData.noNotes.line1: Notes allow you to save a few words about an artist, for example, to remember what you thought of them.
userData.noNotes.line2: To add notes, use the text field at the bottom of an artist's page.
userData.confirmRemove: This action will clear your personal notes for this artist. Do you want to continue?
